data.eml:eml: Two new species of Aphidini Latreille, 1802 (Hemiptera: Aphididae) from Turkey

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Barjadze, Shalva, Özdemir, Işil, Blackman, Roger (2014): Two new species of Aphidini Latreille, 1802 (Hemiptera: Aphididae) from Turkey. Zootaxa 3873 (2): 187-194, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3873.2.6
